title: You can't always tell
creator_credit: Scott Hicks, Terry Jennings and Chrysalis Films
brief_description: This film aims to inform children in the seven to twelve age group of the problem of child molesting. It contains a series of dramatised scenes showing situations in which children can find themselves. Shows children how to avoid putting themselves at risk with strangers.
creator_credit_for_label: Scott Hicks, Terry Jennings and Chrysalis Films
